Trade/Device Name(s): SD Check Gold Blood Glucose Monitoring System
SD CHECK GOLD blood glucose monitoring system
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): SD CHECK GOLD blood glucose meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SD CHECK GOLD Blood Glucose Monitoring System using amperometric detection in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: For monitoring glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, forearm, or upper arm; for home (OTC) use by diabetics or in clinical settings, not for diagnosis or neonatal use.
